nodes.text: Mistral Squadron was a starfighter squadron of the New Republic. Mistral Squadron took part in classified missions and off-the-record assignments which required discretion and trust, above all else.
Mistral Squadron's starfighters were painted pink with light gray markings/stripes.
Mistral Squadron was one of the multiplayer starfighter cosmetic options in the 2020 game Star Wars: Squadrons.
